General_Description: '''The Heroes of the Cult''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: The [[Heroes of the Cult]] were among the greatest warriors in the known world. So long as they stood ready for battle, the [[Cult of Kosmos|Cult]] would always be a threat.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated every member of the Heroes of the Cult.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
